summary:
This mod change the standard Falmer. Now they havnt any amor, weapons or spells.
They just attack with their claws.
descriptionHtml:
description:
I have change the standard Falmer Race with the creation kit. Now they havent any weapons, armor or spells. Now they attack you with their deadly claws. 
But falmers like the shaman has still his spells and his armor. I try to change it too.

installation:
Just put the esp. in the data folder of your game and enable it with the mod-manager.
 
I make the mod, cause the falmer in the game reminds me of the creatures in the movie \"the descent\" And they have no weapons or spells. In future i will make an \"the descent mod\"

what i wanted
---------------------------
-all falmer have no weapons, armor or spells
-soundeffects from the movie,
-a cave map like in the movie, a labyrinth, with many tunnels, traps with falling rock just like in the movie.

until this i have much to learn how to use the CK. (Yes and writing english too ;-) )
author: VanZerg
